Based on your preferences, here are a few recommendations:
1. Afterlife (2011) - A Frenchman who is being interrogated by police is found murdered in a remote town. The investigation comes to a standstill until one year later when one of them is found dead and the original murder case becomes even more mysterious.
  2. Hitch (2005) - Summer 1962. In the office of a Hollywood film studio. A corpse. A Frenchman being interrogated. The start... or the end of a misunderstanding. The authors Alain Riou and Stéphane Boulan revisit one of the most famous encounters in the cinema history when Alfred Hitchcock and François Truffaut met.
  3. White Night (2007) - Thrust back into the life he thought he' d abandoned forever, Lance Summer is torn between his new life and his drug influenced past, the latter which could prove his Downfall.
In these movies, you can find elements such as suspense, mystery, and unexpected plot twists. Additionally, these movies feature talented actors who bring their characters to life on screen.

- Set during the Roaring Twenties in New York City. The movie follows the lives of three young women from different backgrounds and social classes: 1\. First Recommendation: "Scream 4" (2011)
This is a highly anticipated sequel to the original three Scream movies. The movie features an ensemble cast of popular actors including Kristen Bell, Courteney Cox, and Adam Brody.
In this fourth installment of the Scream franchise, we find ourselves in the present day, with the main characters - Sidney Prescott ( Kristen Bell ), Stu Mears ( Scott Glenn ) , and their respective families living out their days in various parts of the country. However, just as they always seem to be running into trouble, these four main characters end up getting themselves involved in some very strange and unexpected circumstances.
Second Recommendation: "Can You Keep a Secret?" (2013)
This is a psychological thriller that follows the life of two young sisters who grow up next door to each other. However, as they grow older, their lives become increasingly complicated and filled with mystery and intrigue. As we follow these two young sisters through their journey of self-discovery and growth, we are sure to be entertained by this highly entertaining psychological thriller that will keep us guessing until the very end
